CustomField.description: This field captures concatenates the legacy NetSuite Campaign IDs together based on the transformation to identify the truly unique campaign (parsing out the variations due to attendance statuses). For example, a "Campaign Internal Derived ID" = "1" may have a "Campaign Legacy Combined NetSuite ID" = "6,7,8,9". All three custom Campaign ID-related fields, in theory, will have the same value for any campaigns created by post-migration. However, only the "NetSuite Campaign ID" field will be populated post-migration.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is used ONLY for purposes of data migration from NetSuite for Phoenix 1.0 and possibly for Phoenix 2.0
CustomField.label: Campaign Legacy Combined NetSuite ID
